name: Ghost
text: So you think you can kill a god?

name: Destiny Patch Notes
text: Fixed a bug where No Land Beyond's impact was too high.

name: Destiny Patch Notes
text: Fixed a bug where No Land Beyond did damage.

name: Ghost
text:
This path should lead us straight to the grave.
...The World's Grave. Not ours.

Ghost: "Can't we just stay here with the murderous robots?"
Player: "No, _little light._"
Ghost: "_Don't_ do that."

name: Master Rahool, Cryptarch
text: Roses are red, your item is blue, your engram was purple, sucks to be you.

name: Hardcase Hunter Cloak
text: If you learn nothing else, learn this: when a Hunter takes up a cloak of a dead comrade, this is a vow.

name: Invective
text: I tried to talk them down. They made a grab for my ghost. It was a pretty short conversation after that.

name: Ghost
text: We've woken the hive!

name: Variks
text: That is the leader of the Fang. He just called you a....well it was an insult.

name: Postmaster
text: Package for warlock... stop floating... bad package!

name: Steel Oracle Z-11
text:
I forsee fire. Fire and screams.
You would, mate. You're a rocket launcher.

name: Ghost
text: A cell! From the Prison of Elders!

name: Omnigul
text: AAAAEEEEEEKKEkekekkekekEKKEKAKAHHAHAHAHA!!!!!!!!!

name: Ghost
text: That wizard came from the moon!

name: The Comedian
text: A. A ha. A ha ha ha. A ha ha ha ha ha ha ha.

name: Eris Morn
text: We were brave, but we were not ready.

name: Variks
text: They will try to kill you. Kill them back.

name: Variks
text: Kill them dead, Guardian.

name: DURGA-GNT Type 0
text: ERROR: Cannot locate target_SKULL. Please locate target_SKULL and establish contact.

name: DURGA-GNT Type 0
text: I am a DURGA-GNT SKULL BUCKET. Please bucket your skull before entering combat.

name: DURGA-GNT Type 0
text: I am a DURGA-GNT LOAD BEARING CUIRASS. Feed me bullets.

name: DURGA-GNT Type 0
text: I am a DURGA-GNT SYME TACTICAL TREAD. Let me walk on the broken corpses of your foes.

name: Pahanin Errata
text: Your missions: protect the City. Look better than Warlocks. But don't look like you're trying.

name: Cloak of Atropos
text: One boast goes: 'when Cabal see my cloak, they flee.' Another goes: 'look at all these dead Cabal!'

name: Frumious Cloak
text: Tell the Warlocks your cloak is frabjous. They respect words they don't understand.

name: Skull of a Dire Ahamkara
text: Reality is the finest flesh, oh bearer mine. And are you not…hungry?

name: Heart of the Praxic Fire
text: In that last moment she seemed as wholly luminescent as the Sun, and I wished to be so brave.

name: scratched behind a buckle
text: YOU WILL DREAM OF TEETH AND NOTHING ELSE

name: MIDA Multi-Tool
text: Select application: Ballistic engagement. Entrenching tool. Avionics trawl. Troll smasher. Stellar sextant. List continues.

name: 13th Understanding, 7th Book of Sorrow
text: To rend one's enemies is to see them not as equals, but objects–hollow of spirit and meaning.

name: Super Pox VLO
text: Found in a null-g hangar, drifting alongside fourteen limbless and decapitated Fallen corpses.

name: Final Boss
text: Become the monster.
